column5: The Cottage at Crazy K Farm is a guest house situated on a non-profit animal sanctuary in rural Hempstead. Our guest-house offers modern amenities and a warm, rural, old-Texas ambiance that reflects its original cattle-ranch roots. Your B & B stay includes breakfast items you prepare yourself, such as cold and hot cereal and farm fresh eggs laid by our many rescued chickens. Proceeds from your stay support our animal sanctuary.
column8: The Cottage at Crazy K Farm Animal Sanctuary
